bibl.title: The RIEC Archaeological and Anthropological Surveys at the Site of Dayr al-Banat.

Christianity and Monasticism in the Fayoum Oasis. Essays from the 2004 International Symposium of the Saint Mark Foundation and the Saint Shenouda the Archimandrite Coptic Society in Honor of Martin Krause
bibl.author: KROL, Alexei

bibl.note: Archaeological surveys conducted at Dayr al-Banat (2 kms northwest of Naqlun) by the Russian Institute for Egyptology in Cairo, 2003. - Necropolis (Roman and Coptic period). - Results of the study of human remains. - 'Convent'.
KROL Alexei, The RIEC Archaeological and Anthropological Surveys at the Site of Dayr al-Banat.

Gawdat GABRA (Ed.), Christianity and Monasticism in the Fayoum Oasis. Essays from the 2004 International Symposium of the Saint Mark Foundation and the Saint Shenouda the Archimandrite Coptic Society in Honor of Martin Krause (Cairo - New York, 2005) pp. 209-216, 6 figg.
